subject: [Exclusive] Content AI by Rank Math is on Sale, Wp

full_threads.body:
Hey Wp - I hope you are doing well! 🙏

We've been working day in and day out behind the scenes, and it's finally here!

Rank Math's all-new Content AI. Take the guesswork out of how many words to write, what keywords or phrases to use in your content, FAQs you can answer, and so much more. Model your content around search intent with content optimization insights and suggestions that are not only tailored to your website but also content that's currently ranking.

⇒ Check out the demo now & get access to Content AI with a HUGE discount during the 1st Anniversary special ⇐

...and if you upgrade to a Rank Math PRO, Business, or Agency plan of your choice today, you'll get access to free content AI credits along with $4,000+ USD worth of bonuses, including WP Rocket, Cloudways, Sitebulb & more.

Here are some of the most commonly asked questions:

Does Rank Math's Content AI work with page builders?

Content AI works with default WordPress Editor (Classic Editor, Gutenberg) as well as with other page builders that include native Rank Math integration like Elementor and Divi.

How does it work behind the scenes?

Optimization starts from the bottom up. Meaning that Rank Math takes the main keyword you want to rank for (your focus keyword) sending the request to our server that collects data from various sources using proprietary algorithms and uses our own AI to offer more relevant suggestions such as how many words, heading, links and media your content should feature based on what's currently ranking.

Is it only available in English or other languages as well?

Our Content AI supports over 80 languages and should seamlessly work with your language as well.

How does Content AI compare against other similar services?

Our entire mission is ensuring as many processes in SEO are not only made simple but more easily done right. And with similar AI services you need to add content to their platform which is completely separate to get suggestions. So you'd have to jump back and forth hundreds of times to implement these suggestions in your content.

This is why Rank Math's Content AI is integrated into your favorite content management system - WordPress to make the content creation & optimization process seamless.

Upgrade to Rank Math PRO and get bonus keywords + partner offers
comes with a 30-day no questions asked money-back-guarantee

If you have any other questions about Rank Math's Content AI or need help, feel free to hit reply to this email and I'll get back to you right away.

Take care & talk soon,

Bhanu Ahluwalia

Don't want to receive these emails or any future plugin updates? Unsubscribe here
Rank Math Ventures LLP, EC-320, G-8, Area Rajouri Garden, Maya Enclave, Hari Nagar, New Delhi, IN - 110064
